name: openchangelog
description: OpenChangelog is a web-based tool to track and publish changelogs for software projects. It supports version tagging, team collaboration, and markdown-based entry submissions in a self-hosted UI.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write changelog entries using markdown formatting for rich text and code examples

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Allow multiple team members to draft, review, and publish changelog entries together

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Tag changes as features, fixes, improvements, or breaking changes for clear communication

features.title: Draft Management
features.description: Save unpublished entries and schedule releases before making them visible to users

features.title: REST API
features.description: Automate changelog updates from CI/CD pipelines or version control systems using REST endpoints
